members.name: Nitinant Somboonvit
members.comment: Nitinant is a senior manager from Communication and High-Tech Operating Group based in Bangkok Thailand. She has been worked in both business and system integration consulting. Her areas of expertise include CRM, PRM (partner relationship management), and Marketing Campaign Management.

members.name: Korrakot Triwichian
members.comment:
I'm a Web Developer. I mostly use different JavaScript Frameworks for both front end and back end development. I've had experience creating and deploying my own applications and APIs.

More than just being a Web Developer, I've also had experience working with machine learning frameworks from scratch to deployment.

Most of my work experiences has made me quite flexible in developing digital solutions as needed from me.

members.comment: Graduate of Bachelor of Science in Computer Science.- With over 22 years of overall work experience as Programmer/Business Analyst/Systems Analyst/Team Lead/Project Manager/Delivery Lead/Capability Lead. - With experience in different phases of the software development lifecycle which include business study, requirements gathering, prototyping, analysis, build/code, test, and support phases.
